name: Network Latency Heatmap
description: Creates a visual heatmap of network latency to various targets over time

parameters.name: Target Hosts
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of hosts or IPs to ping (e.g., 8.8.8.8,1.1.1.1,example.com)

parameters.name: Number of Samples
parameters.description: Total number of samples to collect for each target

parameters.name: Ping Timeout (seconds)
parameters.description: Maximum time to wait for each ping response

parameters.name: Packet Size (bytes)
parameters.description: Size of ping packets in bytes
